de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.annotation

Annotation Type IndexOptions


  • @Documented
 @Inherited
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface IndexOptions
    Describes the options of an Index

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean unique
      Creates the index as a unique value index; inserting duplicates values in this field will cause errors

    • Element Detail

      • unique

        public abstract boolean unique
        Creates the index as a unique value index; inserting duplicates values in this field will cause errors
        Default:
        false
